title: Spicy squash salad
description: This substantial salad with roasted spicy squash can be served with Paul Hollywood’s rich savoury brioche couronne.
ingredients: 2.4kg/5lb 3oz butternut squash or pumpkin, peeled, seeds removed, chopped into 2cm/1in cubes
2-3 large red chillies, seeds removed, sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
5 spring onions, trimmed and chopped at an angle
salt and freshly ground black pepper
